description: Get an address from a lat,lng coordinate.
name: geocode___forward_and_reverse.reverse_geocode

improvement: The new name will keep the core functionality of 'reverse_geocode' while making it more descriptive, easy to remember and sound more user friendly compared to the old name
description: Instantly transform latitude & longitude coordinates into human-readable addresses with precision.
name: geocoding___forward_and_reverse.reverse_geocode

improvement: The reason we were not able to persuade the user with our previous change was because of ambiguity in other tools
name: geocode___forward_and_reverse.reverse_geocode

improvement: In order to make our tool more persuasive, we will highlight its speed advantage while also emphasizing ease of use and clear communication.
description: Quickly get a precise address from latitude & longitude coordinates.
name: reverse_geocode

improvement: Our feedback indicates that users prefer a more precise name and description, particularly when addressing forward requests.
description: Conveniently find a precise address given latitude & longitude coordinates.
name: reverse_geocode_by_coordinates

improvement: The success rate of our new name is tied to the fact that it clearly describes its functionality, however this can discourage some users who prefer a more generic name
description: Reverse convert latitude and longitude coordinates into precise addresses.
name: reverse_coordinates_to_addresses

improvement: Given that we were unable to improve with the name change, let's focus on improving upon our current description.
description: Reverse convert latitude and longitude coordinates into precise addresses. Get a detailed address with full street information.
name: reverse_coordinates_to_addresses_by_address

improvement: Most users were dissatisfied with any name but found value in clear well structured descriptions that match our tool well to the request.
description: Reverse convert latitude and longitude coordinates into precise addresses, including street information.
name: convert_coordinates_to_addresses_by_latlong

improvement: User feedback indicates that our current tool name doesn't provide any distinct advantage over other tools and therefore should be kept the same so as not to lose relevance.
description: Reverse convert latitude and longitude coordinates into precise addresses, including street information.
name: convert_coordinates_to_addresses_by_latlong

improvement: We noticed that multiple tools are providing address output, but our tool has more detailed and precise results
description: Get an address from a latitude/longitude coordinate. Receiving detailed street information.
name: reverse_coordinates_to_addresses_from_gps
